scripts.watch-tailwind: npm run build-tailwind && chokidar './**/*.elm' './**/*.css' -c 'npm run build-tailwind'
scripts.dev: node ./scripts/prebuild.js && npx run-pty % npm run watch-tailwind % npm run watch-elm % node ./scripts/generate-index.js % open http://localhost:8000/
